document.full_text: oil prices jumped on friday, as supportive u.s. jobs data reinforced economic growth expectations and libya's conflict and middle east unrest kept supply threats in focus, pushing both brent and u.s. crude to their highest settlements since 2008.
document.title: oil rises to 2-1/2 year peak on job rise, supply fear
lines_and_colors: oil prices jumped on friday, as supportive u.s. jobs data reinforced economic growth expectations and libya's conflict and middle east unrest kept supply threats in focus, pushing both brent and u.s. crude to their highest settlements since 2008.
